QuestData.Title: Scouting Report: Hostile Natives
QuestData.Description: I bet I know your first question: "What the ook happened to Sergeant Gorrok?" Don't worry, don't worry. He's totally alive. Not dead or anything.$b$b<Riko shuffles uncomfortably.>$b$bWell, we THINK he's alive, but he ALSO might be very, very dead.$b$b<Riko looks into your eyes for approval.>$b$bFine! Let me tell you exactly what happened.
